name: Incompatible Species Episode 4+: Refusal + An Irrational Existence
name_original: Incompatible Species Episode 4+: Refusal + An Irrational Existence
description:
When the genofils in Ranva City seem to disappear, Lucius begrudgingly calls to have a brief hiatus for the Exterminators. However at the Guidepost Food Production plant, awkward introductions are had.

In addition, a sizeable backstory that tells all about how the Exterminator members came to be.

This is a standalone release for the fourth episode and backstory of Incompatible Species: Refusal + An Irrational Existence. You can find the full compilation of releases up to now here: https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe
